full_summary:
================================

**Title**
--------

Construct, Deliver, and Install Columbaria Units in Regina, Saskatchewan

** Reference Number**
-------------------

PW-23-01021109
Amendment Number: 2
Solicitation Number: M5000-23-0827/A

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

Notice Type: Request for Proposal
Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contractor Requirements**
-------------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Training Academy in Regina, Saskatchewan, requires the design, construction, delivery, and installation of two (2) columbaria units. The units must match or closely resemble the existing columbaria units, constructed from grey granite (Stanstead Grey) and black granite (Absolute Black).

**Timing**
--------

Estimated Contract Start Date: Contract award date
Estimated Contract End Date: 2023-03-31
Delivery Time Frame: Contract award date to 2023-03-31
Security requirement must be met

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Lowest Compliant Bidder

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Tenders must be submitted electronically to NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Government Procurement Notice**
------------------------------

The Canadian government retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Bidders are required to consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information. Canada will not be liable for any oversight on the Bidder's part, nor for notification services offered by a third party.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

The RCMP requires that the columbaria units be constructed on or before March 1, 2023, and delivered on or before March 31, 2023. There is an estimated quantity of 2 units required.

**Attachments**
--------------

The Request for Proposal and Amendment documents can be downloaded from the following URLs:
